titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 10) to amend the charter school program under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965; relating to consideration of the bill (H.R. 4438) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to simplify and make permanent the research credit; and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 113-444, by Ms. Foxx.

It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Education and the Workforce now printed in the bill.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 107.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 576.
Ms. Foxx moved the previous question on the amendment and on the resolution.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by voice vote.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - The Chair put the question on adoption of the resolution and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. Polis demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings on the question of adoption of the resolution until a time to be announced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 232 - 178 (Roll no. 205).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/7/2014--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 10) to amend the charter school program under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965; relating to consideration of the bill (H.R. 4438) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to simplify and make permanent the research credit.
